channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: VENTED CAP LEAKING DURING TRANSIT, UNLOADED, PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE. DescribePack: VENTED CAP LEAKING CORROSIVE LIQUID INSIDE A WET TORN OPENED DTERIATED SOILED BOX SOILING ALL CONTENTS INSIDE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED INSIDE A HAZMAT BAG AND RED HAZMAT TOTE.
